sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Card } from 'src/app/models/Card'; @Component({ selector: 'app-player-hand', templateUrl: './player-hand.component.html', styleUrls: ['./player-hand.component.css'] }) export class PlayerHandComponent { hand: Card[] = [ {value: "1", suit: "clubs", selected: false}, {value: "2", suit: "hearts", selected: false}, {value: "3", suit: "diamonds", selected: false}, {value: "4", suit: "spades", selected: false}, {value: "5", suit: "clubs", selected: false} ]; }
